sentences.en: By the end of 40's the riddle of superfluidity was solved.

sentences.cn: 他终于猜出了这个谜语.

sentences.en: He got the answer to the riddle as quick as a flash.

sentences.en: Scientists claimed yesterday to have solved the riddle of the birth of the Universe.
sentences.cn: 科学家们昨天声称已经解开了宇宙形成之谜。

sentences.en: She's a complete riddle, even to her parents.

sentences.en: They were comparing notes on each other's progress towards solving that most taxing of all puzzles: the riddle of the human genome.
sentences.cn: 他们就解决人类所面临的最大难题，即人类基因组之谜的进展情况交换了意见。

sentences.en: Was this the answer to the frightening riddle of Tara's silence?
